name: Alex Tokolyi

name: Dr. Chrispin Chaguza

name: Dr. Christine J. Boinett

name: Dr. Dorota Jamrozy

name: Gareth Peat

name: Gerry Tonkin-Hill
description: I study within-host evolution and transmission in *Streptococcus pneumoniae* as well as  developing statistical and bioinformatics methods for microbial genomics.

name: Kate Mellor

name: Dr. Narender Kumar

name: Neil MacAlasdair

name: Sophie Belman

name: Dr. Stephanie Wai-U Lo
description: I oversee the Global Pneumococcal Sequencing Project by setting overall scientific strategy, communicating with collaborators, and delivering outputs through publications.

name: Uzma Basit Khan

name: Victoria Carr
description: I am in the Pathogen Informatics Group working with the team to develop bioinformatics software, particularly for the GPS Project.
